name: brightdata-plugin
description: Web scraping, Google search, structured data extraction, and MCP server integration powered by Bright Data. Includes 4 skills: scrape any webpage as markdown (with bot detection/CAPTCHA bypass), search Google with structured JSON results, extract data from 40+ websites (Amazon, LinkedIn, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and more), and orchestrate Bright Data's 60+ MCP tools for search, scraping, structured extraction, and browser automation.
